meanings.definition: Wallpaper or other decorative material used to cover walls.
meanings.sent1: The paperhangings in the living room have a floral pattern.
meanings.sent2: I need to buy new paperhangings for the bedroom walls.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to climb the paperhangings, leaving tiny claw marks.
meanings.sent4: Her love for art was evident in the way she carefully chose her paperhangings.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant paperhangings transformed the dull room into a cozy space.

meanings.definition: The act or process of hanging wallpaper.
meanings.sent1: He learned the art of paperhangings from his grandfather.
meanings.sent2: The paperhangings of the entire house took a week to complete.
meanings.sent3: The paperhangings project turned into a fun family activity.
meanings.sent4: She approached the paperhangings task with precision and care.
meanings.sent5: The paperhangings job required patience and attention to detail.

meanings.definition: A collection or selection of wallpaper designs.
meanings.sent1: The store offers a wide variety of paperhangings to choose from.
meanings.sent2: She spent hours browsing through different paperhangings for her room.
meanings.sent3: The paperhangings catalog featured trendy and classic designs.
meanings.sent4: His passion for interior design led him to create his own line of paperhangings.
meanings.sent5: The exhibition showcased unique and artistic paperhangings from around the world.
